title: Zolotoe Koltso
text:
Golden Ring (Russian: Золотое кольцо, transliteration: Zolotoye Koltso) is a Russian folk-pop group, founded 1988 in Moscow by Alexander Kostyuk and Nadezhda Kadysheva. The name of the group refers to the Golden Ring of Russia.
